DataElement.preferredName: NonCigarette Tobaco Smoking Cessation Duration Year Number
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Numeric value to represent the number of years that have elapsed since an individual last use noncigarette tobacco products.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Discontinuation of the habit of smoking, the inhaling and exhaling of tobacco smoke._An operation in which a term denies or inverts the meaning of another term or construction._Finely cut tobacco encased in a wrapper of thin paper and rolled for smoking.(NCI)_Finely cut tobacco encased in a wrapper of thin paper and rolled for smoking.(NCI)_The leaves of the tobacco plant, Nicotiana tabacum, dried and prepared for smoking or ingestion.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: An operation in which a term denies or inverts the meaning of another term or construction.:Finely cut tobacco encased in a wrapper of thin paper and rolled for smoking.(NCI):The leaves of the tobacco plant, Nicotiana tabacum, dried and prepared for smoking or ingestion.

Concepts.definition: An operation in which a term denies or inverts the meaning of another term or construction.
Finely cut tobacco encased in a wrapper of thin paper and rolled for smoking.

The dried cured leaves of the tobacco plant, Nicotiana tabacum, used for smoking, chewing, or snuff.  Tobacco contains nicotine, a stimulant, and other biologically active ingredients having carcinogenic properties.

Property.preferredDefinition: Discontinuation of the habit of smoking, the inhaling and exhaling of tobacco smoke.

Concepts.definition: Discontinuation of the habit of smoking, the inhaling and exhaling of tobacco smoke.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Observations and activities relating to behavior, such as smoking and ETOH use.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: Duration of an event expressed in number of years._The period of time during which something continues._A period of time that it takes for Earth to make a complete revolution around the sun, approximately 365 days; a specific one year period.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: The period of time during which something continues.:The period of time that it takes for Earth to make a complete revolution around the sun; a period of time containing 365 days.:Number; a concept of quantity derived from zero and units; a numeral or string of numerals that is used for identification.

Concepts.definition: The period of time during which something continues.
A period of time that it takes for Earth to make a complete revolution around the sun, approximately 365 days; a specific one year period.
A numeral or string of numerals expressing value, quantity, or identification.

ReferenceDocuments.description: Number of years since last used other tobacco
